name: Shrek In The Backrooms - An Endless Runner
name_original: Shrek In The Backrooms - An Endless Runner
description: HELP! Shrek is stuck in the backrooms! How did he get there? Well.. we don't answer those questions. All he can do is just run. He can't escape and there are obama pyramids??? Weird stuff happen in this realm and we're not judging it at all.  It's easy to control. Just hold the left mouse button and drag left and right and get as far as you can. If you touch the obama pyramids shrek will die in the backrooms. How far can you get?...
